ความแฟร์เกม

Among one of the most toxic fan bases of any game, at least on European servers.

Valve literally has no interest other than taking in the profit from crates and keys. So expect little interest from them when it comes to keeping cheaters and griefers out of competitive play.

Give it a roll if you're feeling nostalgic. Just dont expect the community it once had.

Honestly its fun with friends, Don't play if you think about sewer slide, it'll get you there every time.

I have to say after playing over 800 hours on several different pc's  I cant take this bs shitty game any more. its not the hackers or anything like that. Its the fact that the rigs I have and have had have always been more then twice the recommended set up and no matter how I do the setting or what guide I follow there is no consistent frame rate. I have been playing counter-strike since the first half mod was released and that kept me loyal for many years... after giving it a break for a few years the urge to play again came back 2 rounds in and I am uninstalling it again... there is no point in playing a game that drops in frames every time you see ... or almost see a baddie.... there is no reason for this other then bad game design. My game list is full and all games run great on max for me WITH EXCEPTION to CS:GO...  trash game fair well...
Uns dos melhoras jogos que ja joguei marcou minha vida

Way too much blatant cheating and Valve doesn't care.

El juego lleno de gente usando hacks pero lo importante son las cajas. Comunidad de mierda que al final hacen que yo me una a ser una mierda mas. No es normal que de cada 5 partidas al menos 2 te enfrentes a gente que usa hacks haciendo que ya uno juegue condicionado incluso cuando el equipo rival es legit. Si quereis ser felices no lo juegueis.
слова не могут описать, насколько сильно я люблю эту игру. Но цифры могут - 0/10
